answerText: sweat glands[10] Sweat glands are found in this largest organ of the human body, which also contains hair. The epidermis is the outer layer of this organ.
heading: MUT |2014 | 3 | 21 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The secretion of the eccrine type of these glands consists primarily of sodium chloride and water. For 10 points each: [10] Name these glands whose primary function in humans is thermoregulation. The apocrine variety of them opens into hair follicles.
